name: abubble
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
full of a particular emotion, especially excitement: abubble with The concert hall was abubble with excitement as the audience awaited the arrival of the conductor. The whole town has been abubble for weeks since the news was announced.
More examplesFewer examplesShe was abubble with enthusiasm about the coming trip.They were all abubble at the prospect that he would be coming to their town.The house was full of noise and good cheer on Christmas Day, the children abubble with their excitement at their presents.
